alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Bremer; Butler; Franklin; Grundy; Hardin; Tama (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 7:31PM CDT until July 05 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hardin County in central Iowa... Black Hawk County in northeastern Iowa... Northern Tama County in central Iowa... Bremer County in northeastern Iowa... Eastern Franklin County in north central Iowa... Grundy County in central Iowa... Butler County in north central Iowa... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 730 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Sheffield to 11 miles northeast of Roland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waterloo, Cedar Falls, Waverly, Iowa Falls, Hampton, Eldora, Grundy Center, Allison, Evansdale, Jesup, La Porte City, Hudson, Sumner, Parkersburg, Denver, Reinbeck, Ackley, Clarksville, Tripoli and Shell Rock. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 57 and 73. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Black Hawk; Bremer; Butler; Franklin; Grundy; Hardin; Tama
